trans-unit.source: Activates glossar for the whole site.
trans-unit.target: Activates glossar for the whole site.

trans-unit.source: Add number how often a Term can be replaced on a page.. Zero for unlimited.
trans-unit.target: Add number how often a Term can be replaced on a page.. Zero for unlimited.

trans-unit.source: Add glossary to system maintenance list
trans-unit.target: Add glossary to system maintenance list

trans-unit.source: Glossary will be added to "Clear data" section in system maintanance. This option protect user from clearing glossar inadvertently.
trans-unit.target: Glossary will be added to "Clear data" section in system maintanance. This option protect user from clearing glossar inadvertently.

trans-unit.source: Glossar will not load a preview window, if user hovers over a term in frontend.
trans-unit.target: Glossar will not load a preview window, if user hovers over a term in frontend.

trans-unit.source: Terms will be show as link, even if no content is available. This could cause duplicate content.
trans-unit.target: Terms will be show as link, even if no content is available. This could cause duplicate content.

trans-unit.source: Terms will be used as headline on detailpages.
trans-unit.target: Terms will be used as headline on detailpages.

trans-unit.source: Plural search means, term will be replaced until end of word: Bad-emeister.
trans-unit.target: Plural search means, term will be replaced until end of word: Bad-emeister.

trans-unit.source: Include content, which are excluded by contao search
trans-unit.target: Include content, which are excluded by contao search

trans-unit.source: Content which is marked as not searchable, indexer::stop|continue.
trans-unit.target: Content which is marked as not searchable, indexer::stop|continue.

trans-unit.source: Those archives wont be crawled from glossary.
trans-unit.target: Those archives wont be crawled from glossary.

trans-unit.source: No fallback languages will be searched on a page.
trans-unit.target: No fallback languages will be searched on a page.

trans-unit.source: Only full words will be replaced.
trans-unit.target: Only full words will be replaced.

trans-unit.source: Those chars will be ignored in plural search. As example Contao(CMS) only Contao will be replaces if you set ( as illegal char.
trans-unit.target: Those chars will be ignored in plural search. As example Contao(CMS) only Contao will be replaces if you set ( as illegal char.

trans-unit.source: Defines width of the preview layer, which appear after user hover with mouse over a term.
trans-unit.target: Defines width of the preview layer, which appear after user hover with mouse over a term.

trans-unit.source: Defines height of the preview layer, which appear after user hover with mouse over a term.
trans-unit.target: Defines height of the preview layer, which appear after user hover with mouse over a term.

trans-unit.source: Default site if no page is selected.
trans-unit.target: Default site if no page is selected.
